name: Cruel Thesis
description:
A game for Found Footage Jam Story 

To graduate from college, a certain college student needs to write a report that relates what they study during 4 years in college. Interested in spiritual methods and engineering, the student decided to write a report about obscure method for constructing a building/infrastructure to ensure its durability and quality. 

Without support from a friend, the student writes and finds the report alone and make sure to complete the report before end of the year.

System Requirement Minimum Recommended  OS : Windows 7/10 (64-bit version) OS : Windows 7/10 (64-bit version) Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or higher Processor: Intel Core i7-3770/AMD FX-8350 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Memory: 8GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 840M Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 or higher
